about.description:
Legal and natural persons involved in the production and distribution of food, as well as providers of public drinking water supply, must ensure continuous training for employees who come into contact with food in their work. Internal control must be established on the basis of the HACCP system, which enables the identification of microbiological, chemical, and physical risk factors that may pose a threat to health.

We offer professional support in establishing and maintaining the HACCP system, training employees in the field of food safety, and providing comprehensive solutions for the planning and implementation of HACCP systems in the food industry.

Are you a food safety supervisor or a responsible person for food safety in a public institution, food processing company, or tourism and hospitality establishment? Contact us, and together we will ensure the safety of food in your organization!

consulting.title: Food Safety Consulting and Legislation
consulting.description: We provide expert advice on European and national legislative requirements in the field of food safety. We assist with regulatory implementation, monitoring changes, and ensuring your business remains compliant.

haccp.title: HACCP Systems – Implementation, Monitoring, and Training
haccp.description: We offer comprehensive support in establishing and operating HACCP systems: internal audits, preparation of HACCP documentation, employee training, management of hygiene programs, validations, and consultancy to ensure legal compliance.

allergens.title: Allergen and Nutritional Value Testing and Labeling
allergens.description: We offer rapid testing to detect allergens (e.g., gluten) in food products and production environments, along with expert guidance on proper allergen labeling, nutritional value calculation, and formulation of health and nutrition claims in compliance with current legislation.

declaration.title: Declarations, Specifications, and Technological Documentation
declaration.description: We prepare food declarations, technical specifications, technological procedures, risk analyses, and conduct process validations for businesses.

sampling.title: Sampling and Laboratory Analysis
sampling.description:
We perform:
- Food sampling with microbiological assessment,
- Drinking water sampling (Legionella),
- Swab sampling with expert evaluation,
- Food sampling for chemical analyses (PAOH, aflatoxins, acrylamide, pesticides, allergens).

inspection_support.title: Support for Inspection Audits
inspection_support.description: We prepare all documentation required for inspection audits and provide expert presence and support during the inspection, including assistance in addressing any identified non-compliances.

hygiene_sanitation.title: Hygiene and Sanitation Regulations and Preventive Measures
hygiene_sanitation.description: We provide guidance and support in establishing hygiene and sanitation protocols, and implement preventive measures such as cleaning screens, inspecting pest control boxes, and other activities to ensure a safe working environment.

mentoring.title: Mentoring for High School and University Students
mentoring.description: We provide mentorship to high school students (bakers, pastry chefs, butchers, oil producers, food technicians) and university students in food science.

training.title: Support for Certification and Training in Compliance with Legislation
training.description: We provide expert support in preparing for certifications such as Prečrtan žitni klas – brez glutena, IFS Global Markets Food, IFS, BRC, and ISO 14001, including status analysis, documentation preparation, and guidance through to successful certification. We also conduct training in accordance with EU food hygiene regulations and national legislation on the safety of food and food-contact materials.
